title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
**Unlock the Secrets of Electricity and Magnetism with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit!**

Are you ready to spark your child's curiosity and ignite a passion for STEM learning? Look no further! The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is an award-winning, comprehensive educational tool that's perfect for kids aged 8+ and grades 3-6.

**Explore the Wonders of Electricity and Magnetism**

With 25 guided experiment lessons, this kit takes you on an exciting journey to discover the principles of electric motors, generators, and magnetic fields. The 48-page, full-color student guide is designed to engage and educate, making complex concepts easy to understand and fun to learn.

**Hands-on Learning at its Best**

Build simple circuits, experiment with magnets, and learn about gears and drive-trains. The kit's transparent plastic electric motor and reconfigurable hand-crank electric generator allow kids to explore the conversion of kinetic energy to electrical energy and vice versa.

**Develop Essential Skills and Knowledge**

Through this kit, your child will develop a solid understanding of:

* Electric motor and generator functions
* Magnetic fields and electric current
* Energy conversion and circuit building

**Award-Winning Quality and Durability**

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit has earned the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award, ensuring that it meets the highest standards of educational excellence. The kit's compact design (13.1 x 8.9 x 2.6 inches, 1.3 pounds) makes it easy to store and transport.

**Give Your Child the Gift of STEM Education**

Order the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit today and unlock a world of discovery, creativity, and fun!

**Unlock the Secrets of Electricity and Magnetism with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit!**

Are you ready to spark your child's curiosity and ignite a passion for STEM learning? Look no further! The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is an award-winning, comprehensive educational tool that will take your child on an exciting journey of discovery and exploration.

**25 Guided Experiment Lessons**

With 25 guided experiment lessons, your child will delve into the fascinating world of electricity and magnetism, learning about electric motors, generators, and the fundamental principles that govern them. The 48-page color student guide provides a clear, step-by-step approach to each experiment, ensuring a fun and engaging learning experience.

**Explore Magnetic Fields, Electric Current, and Energy Conversion**

Using the kit's transparent plastic electric motor, your child will learn how to convert electricity into motion and motion into electricity. They'll also explore magnetic fields, build simple circuits, and discover the secrets of energy conversion. With the ability to reconfigure the motor to a hand-crank electric generator, the possibilities for learning are endless!

**Develop Essential STEM Skills**

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is designed to help your child develop essential STEM skills, including critical thinking, problem-solving, and analytical reasoning. By working through the experiments, they'll gain a deeper understanding of the underlying principles and develop a strong foundation for future learning.

**Awards and Recognition**

This exceptional science kit has earned the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award, a testament to its quality and effectiveness in promoting STEM education.

**Order Now and Ignite a Lifelong Love of Learning!**

Don't miss this opportunity to inspire your child's curiosity and creativity. Order the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit today and watch them thrive in the world of STEM!

**Unlock the Secrets of Electricity and Magnetism with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit!**

Are you ready to spark your child's curiosity and ignite a passion for STEM learning? Look no further! The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is the ultimate educational experience for kids aged 8+ and grades 3-6.

**Explore the Wonders of Electricity and Magnetism**

With 25 guided experiment lessons, this comprehensive kit delves into the fascinating world of motors and generators. Your child will discover how electric motors work, how to build simple circuits, and the magic of magnetic fields. They'll even learn about gears and drive-trains, and how to convert kinetic energy into electrical energy and vice versa!

**Awards and Accolades**

This exceptional kit has earned the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award, a testament to its high-quality educational content and engaging learning experience.

**What's Included:**

* 48-page full-color student guide filled with easy-to-follow instructions and illustrations
* Reconfigurable motor with transparent plastic, allowing kids to see the inner workings
* Battery-powered motor operation and hand-crank electric generator capabilities
* Comprehensive manual with 60 pages of detailed explanations and diagrams
* Durable and compact design, perfect for home or classroom use

**Develop Essential Skills and Knowledge**

With the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, your child will develop:

* A deep understanding of electric motor and generator functions
* Knowledge of magnetic fields and electric current
* Problem-solving and critical thinking skills
* Confidence in their ability to design, build, and experiment with complex systems

**Order Now and Spark a Lifelong Love of Learning!**

Give your child the gift of STEM education and watch them thrive with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit. Order now and ignite a passion for discovery and innovation that will last a lifetime!
